steps.title: Draw four long cylinders for the bamboo poles.
steps.content: Draw four long cylinders for the bamboo poles. Draw them straight or bent; it's up to you.

steps.title: Add four long bamboo poles.
steps.content: Add four long bamboo poles. These should be skinnier than your first drawn cylinders.

steps.title: Draw the bamboo culms (or stems).
steps.content: Draw the bamboo culms (or stems). To do so, draw four small cylindrical shapes and place them measurably apart, dividing the bamboo pole into five equal parts.

steps.title: Repeat the previous step.
steps.content: Repeat the previous step. This time, draw smaller cylindrical shapes on the skinnier bamboo poles.

steps.title: Draw the leaves.
steps.content: Draw the leaves. Draw the leaves of the bamboo by drawing leaves into the shape of a fan. Then draw the leaves by spreading them on the bamboo poles. Make sure that the leaves appear to be behind the poles.

steps.title: Draw leaves in front of the poles.
steps.content: Draw leaves in front of the poles.

steps.title: Outline your artwork.
steps.content: Outline your artwork. Outline by inking over your penciled drawing and erasing your pencil marks to clean up your drawing.

steps.title: Color your bamboo artwork and you’re done.
steps.content: Color your bamboo artwork and you’re done. Color it by using different variations of green such as yellow-green and forest green.
